job.title: Data Analyst 2 - Remote
job.description: ltpgtAs aampnbspltstronggtData Analyst 2ltstronggt you will be working with Electronic Medical Records Billing and other data types that we receive from our health care provider clients The analyst will be supporting tier two productions and will be involved with data investigations application investigations identifying defects in applications etc A successful candidate for this positionampnbspwill be an analytic thinker flexible problemsolver excellent communicator and team playerltpgtltpgtYoull enjoy the flexibility to telecommute from anywhere within the US as you take on some tough challengesltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtTraining will be conducted virtually from your homeltstronggtltpgtltpgtAll Telecommuters will be required to adhere to the Groups Telecommuter PolicyltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPrimary ResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWill be an expert in Optum Analytics data processing methodology attribute logic and product workflowsfunctionality in order to comprehensively support application users developing innovative healthcare use cases within Optum Analytics Product SuiteampnbspltligtltligtWill drive client issues to resolution by identifying the root of the issue engaging clients for required feedback escalating to internal team members if appropriate and tracking data fixes or enhancements through to successful release into the productltligtltligtWill communicate directly with clients to resolve questions and issues in a timely and consultative mannerltligtltligtWill understand the data transformation process and work closely with Data Factory team members to ensure end to end resolutions of data improvementsltligtltligtWill understand healthcare industry priorities and the direct correlation between Optum Analytics Products and issues clients are facing in the marketltligtltligtWill be a resource for Implementation Training and Client Management teams to allow for holistic support of our clients across the Client Services teamltligtltligtWill escalate Product feedback issues and enhancements to the Optum Analytics Product team to encourage appropriate development and growth of products in line with client needsltligtltulgtltpgtYoull be rewarded and recognized for your performance in an environment that will challenge you and give you clear direction on what it takes to succeed in your role as well as provide development for other roles you may be interested inltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequired QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree or higherltligtltligt2 years of experience working with healthcare data with one of the followingampnbspHL7 v2 CCDs 835s 837s all means of data transferring from hospital dataltligtltligt2 years of experience working with data analyzing data and understanding dataltligtltligt2 years of experience working with SQL or another data analysis language SAS RltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtPreferred QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree or higher in Engineering Computer Science Business or other related field in technologyltligtltligtAbility to query large data sets using SQL and query optimization skills including PLSQL or TSQLltligtltligtFamiliarity or experience working with AWSAzure on Cloud or Big Data conceptsltligtltligtUnderstanding of clinical processes and vocabulary and basic procedures for working with claims such as deduplication reversals eligibility etc and the lifecycle of a claimltligtltligtExperience managing clients or working with clients on tasks like requirements gathering impact analysis etcltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtSoft skillsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtHighly analytical curious and creativeltligtltligtStrong written and verbal communications skillsltligtltligtStrong organization skills detail oriented with careful attention to work processesltligtltligtTakes ownership of responsibilities and follows through handoffs to other groupsltligtltligtEnjoys a fastpaced environment and the opportunity to quickly learn new skillsltligtltligtAbility to work creatively and flexibly both independently and as part of a teamltligtltligtAbility to analyze user requests define requirements investigate and report conclusionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
